description: As Hunter Stone gets ready for the evening's masquerade ball, an uneasy feeling takes over him, almost as if he's being watched. It was exactly a year ago to the day that Hunter's ex Arad died tragically, and Hunter gets the feeling Arad is looking in on him. Even at the party, surrounded by other people, Hunter gets the creepy feeling he's being shadowed, so he convinces his current boyfriend, Dylan Knight, to leave the party early. Once back at the house, Hunter is still uneasy, so Dylan coaxes him into the bedroom to try and take his mind off his worries. As Dylan lay in bed, stroking his cock, Hunter crouches down and begins to suck it, downing Dylan's cock with reckless abandon as Dylan fingers his hole. Hunter can feel Arad's presence, even as Dylan sucks him off, and it's almost like he can feel Arad's strong hands caressing his back, before filling him up with the warm memory of his perfect cock. Hunter imagines Arad pounding him from behind, just like in the old days, and when Dylan busts his nut Hunter wipes his face and reminisces wistfully, remarking how nice it is to feel Dylan's load all over his face. 'But I didn't cum on your face, babe,' Dylan replies.Enjoy!
series: NDO - 4618 - Dylan Knight, Arad & Hunter Stone
title: Haunted by my Ex
